properties.entry: INSERT INTO Item (ItemCategoryId, ItemNo, Rent, AdultCapacity, ChildCapacity, IsActive, Status, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, UpdatedBy, UpdatedOn) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO Room (ItemId, FloorNo, Size, NumberOfBed, LandLine, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, UpdatedBy, UpdatedOn) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE Item SET ItemCategoryId = ?, ItemNo = ?, Rent = ?, AdultCapacity = ?, ChildCapacity = ?, IsActive = ?, UpdatedBy = ?, UpdatedOn = ? WHERE Id = ?
UPDATE Room SET FloorNo = ?, Size = ?, NumberOfBed = ?, LandLine = ?, UpdatedBy = ?, UpdatedOn = ? WHERE ItemId = ?
UPDATE Item SET Status = ?, UpdatedBy = ?, UpdatedOn = ? WHERE Id = ?

SELECT Item.Id, Item.ItemCategoryId, ItemCategory.Name, Item.ItemNo, Item.Rent, Item.AdultCapacity, Item.ChildCapacity, Item.IsActive, Item.Status, ItemType.Id, ItemType.Name, Room.Id, Room.FloorNo, Room.Size, Room.NumberOfBed, Room.LandLine FROM Item LEFT OUTER JOIN Room ON Room.ItemId = Item.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN ItemCategory ON ItemCategory.Id = Item.ItemCategoryId LEFT OUTER JOIN ItemType ON ItemType.Id = ItemCategory.ItemTypeId WHERE Item.Id = ?

SELECT Item.Id, Item.ItemCategoryId, ItemCategory.Name, Item.ItemNo, Item.Rent, Item.AdultCapacity, Item.ChildCapacity, Item.IsActive, Item.Status, ItemType.Id, ItemType.Name, Room.Id, Room.FloorNo, Room.Size, Room.NumberOfBed, Room.LandLine FROM Item LEFT OUTER JOIN Room ON Room.ItemId = Item.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN ItemCategory ON ItemCategory.Id = Item.ItemCategoryId LEFT OUTER JOIN ItemType ON ItemType.Id = ItemCategory.ItemTypeId WHERE Item.Status = 1 AND Item.ItemCategoryId = ? ORDER BY Item.Id DESC

SELECT Item.Id, Item.ItemCategoryId, ItemCategory.Name, Item.ItemNo, Item.Rent, Item.AdultCapacity, Item.ChildCapacity, Item.IsActive, Item.Status, ItemType.Id, ItemType.Name, Room.Id, Room.FloorNo, Room.Size, Room.NumberOfBed, Room.LandLine FROM Item LEFT OUTER JOIN Room ON Room.ItemId = Item.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN ItemCategory ON ItemCategory.Id = Item.ItemCategoryId LEFT OUTER JOIN ItemType ON ItemType.Id = ItemCategory.ItemTypeId LEFT OUTER JOIN Provider ON Provider.Id = ItemType.ProviderId WHERE Item.Status = 1 AND Provider.Id = ? ORDER BY Item.Id DESC
